summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Elmwood Place, from Twenty-seventh Avenue South to Bradner Place, Bradner Place, from Elmwood Place to Irving Street; Judkins Street, from Twenty-fourth Avenue South to Twenty-ninth Avenue South; and Twenty-seventh Avenue South, from Charles Street to Judkins Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing concrete sidewalks, in accordance with Resolution No. 467 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
